title: Minimalist 1-Bed Apartment with Private Garden in Historic Krosno
description: Discover a Scandinavian-inspired retreat in the heart of Krosno’s Old Town. This refined 1-bedroom apartment (73 sqm) offers two elegant bathrooms, an open floor plan melding living, dining, and kitchen zones, and directional windows infusing the space with natural light. Sustainability meets luxury with an integrated solar energy system. Step out to your private garden—a rare find—in a boutique residence that puts calm and beauty first.
neighborhood_description: Old Town Krosno exudes a tranquil, artistic atmosphere, renowned for its cobbled streets, historic charm, and intimate restaurants recalling the region’s glassworking heritage. Convenient highway access provides effortless city and countryside connections. Minutes from curated shopping and the pulse of town culture, it’s ideal for those who value both retreat and inspiration.
lifestyle_benefits: easy access to shopping and dining
target_buyer: Discerning individuals or couples seeking understated Scandinavian luxury blended with sustainability and privacy within a character-rich neighborhood.
market_positioning: This residence distinguishes itself by offering upscale, contemporary amenities rarely combined with a historic low-urban context in southern Poland—positioned for luxury-oriented buyers with an appreciation for both heritage and modern sustainable living.
